text:
Hi guys,

i found a bug in Apache 1.3.37 (and above) under win32 . To reproduce the bug,
set your system time to year "2038" or higher, open your webbrowser and goto
"http://localhost/". Apache crash!

ps: Could it be fixed? I haven't test it under other operating systems.
And, yes me english isn't very well. :-)

Thanks.
creator: mail@h84.net
wrowe@apache.org
text:
"Could it be fixed?"  --  NO.

If you haven't upgraded to 2.0 or later by 2038, sorry

...                                    you will be SOL.

Hi Will,

well, i'am surprised! But it isn't impossible, if i became 52 years old and i'am
still using Windows XP with my very old hardware, the system could crash. :-P

But you are right, it should be better to upgrade to Apache 2.X.
Will, are you an admin or developer?

...

Thanks for your fast request. ;-)
creator: mail@h84.net
